resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105553</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105553</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211497</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Paleoclimatology Education and Outreach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paleoclimatology Ausbildung und übertreffen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'éducation de Paleoclimatology et dépassent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A instrução de Paleoclimatology e excede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La formazione di Paleoclimatology e supera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εκπαίδευση παλαιοκλιματολογίας και ξεπερνά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La educación de Paleoclimatology y excede</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This NOAA website offers a collection of links to paleoclimate (past climate) information and data. Links are organized by topic, which include: highlights from the paleoclimatology program; Ocean sciences; Coral cores; Tree rings; Pollen; and Additional resources.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese NOAA Web site bietet eine Ansammlung Links 
paleoclimate (hinter Klima) Informationen und Daten an. Links 
werden durch Thema organisiert, die einschließen: Höhepunkte 
vom paleoclimatology Programm; Ozeanwissenschaften; 
Korallenrote Kerne; Baumringe; Blütenstaub; 
und zusätzliche Betriebsmittel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site Web de NOAA offre une collection de liens 
à l'information et aux données de paleoclimate (après le climat). 
Des liens sont organisés par sujet, qui incluent : points
culminants du programme de paleoclimatology ; Les sciences 
d'océan ; Noyaux de corail ; Boucles d'arbre ; 
Pollen ; et ressources supplémentaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web site de NOAA oferece uma coleção das 
ligações à informação e aos dados do paleoclimate (após o 
clima). As ligações são organizadas pelo tópico, que 
incluem: destaques do programa do paleoclimatology; 
Ciências do oceano; Núcleos corais; Anéis da 
árvore; Pólen; e recursos adicionais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web site di NOAA offre una collezione di 
collegamenti alle informazioni ed ai dati del paleoclimate (oltre il 
clima). I collegamenti sono organizzati dal soggetto, che 
includono: punti culminanti dal programma di paleoclimatology; 
Scienze dell'oceano; Nuclei di corallo; Anelli 
dell'albero; Polline; e risorse supplementari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος NOAA προσφέρει μια συλλογή των 
συνδέσεων με paleoclimate (κλίμα παρελθόντος) τις πληροφορίες 
και τα στοιχεία. Οι συνδέσεις οργανώνονται από το θέμα, οι 
οποίες περιλαμβάνουν: κυριώτερα σημεία από το πρόγραμμα 
παλαιοκλιματολογίας  Ωκεάνιες επιστήμες  Πυρήνες 
κοραλλιών  Δαχτυλίδια δέντρων  Γύρη  και 
πρόσθετα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web site de NOAA ofrece una colección de 
conexiones a la información y a los datos del paleoclimate (más 
allá de clima). Las conexiones son ordenadas por asunto, que 
incluyen: toques de luz del programa del paleoclimatology; 
Ciencias del océano; Memorias coralinas; Anillos 
del árbol; Polen; y recursos adicionales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:NATIONAL CLIMATIC DATA CENTER (PART OF NOAA)
FN:NATIONAL CLIMATIC DATA CENTER (PART OF NOAA)
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211497</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105553</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/paleoclimatology-education-and-outreach</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
